p: Eligible subjects over 40 years old were less likely to be treated compared with subjects below 40 years during the first period (1998–2003) ( Table 3). The age effect was not evidenced in the other periods. The association between region of residence and treatment was observed in 2004–2010; people living in Dakar were more likely to be treated. Occupation and marital status showed varying associations with treatment initiation in the different periods of time.
